thread.title: NYPD Mourns Loss of Paralyzed Detective Who Forgave His Attacker
thread.title_full: NYPD Mourns Loss of Paralyzed Detective Who Forgave His Attacker

title: NYPD Mourns Loss of Paralyzed Detective Who Forgave His Attacker
text:
NYPD Mourns Loss of Paralyzed Detective Who Forgave His Attacker 
Thousands of police officers lined 5th Avenue on Friday to honor Steven McDonald, an NYPD detective who was shot and paralyzed on the job in 1986, but went on to became a champion of forgiveness. Previous
